General.Name: Northland Power Inc
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Northland Power Inc., an independent power producer, develops, builds, owns, and operates clean and green power projects in North America, Europe, Latin America, and Asia. The company produces electricity from renewable resources, such as wind, solar, or hydropower, as well as clean-burning natural gas and biomass for sale under power purchase agreements and other revenue arrangements. It owned or had an economic interest in 3.2 gigawatts of operating generating capacity. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 30 St. Clair Avenue West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4V 3A1
